title: Wont Open on my Mac
body:
I just downloaded LoL and added it to applications, but every time I try and open it, it will freeze then close. I don't know if I did anything wrong in the downloading process, or if there isn't enough space or what. Please respond if you can help

Thank you,
SpiceeeMelone

replies.body: The patcher needs a strong network to establish communication with our servers.  You might be an experiencing an issue where your connection might not be reaching us and causing it to not launch.  As a first step, go over our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) guide to get this fixed up.  Make sure to select Mac options for instructions specific to your OS.  Please let me know if you continue to have issues, and we can dig deeper!
